sec.p: Five SNPs (SNPs 3556_15, 1822_9, 3599_4, 4474_34, and 886_19) that had been previously identified as under divergent selection in the two species (Momigliano et al., 2017b) and able to unambiguously assign unknown individuals to the correct species (Momigliano et al., 2018) were genotyped using a SNaPshot™ Multiplex Kit (Thermo Fisher). All loci were amplified in a single, multiplexed PCR using the primers developed by Momigliano et al. ( 2018) targeting the regions flanking the outlier loci (GenBank Accession numbers: KY933571–KY933582) sequenced by Momigliano et al. ( 2017b). The primers target very short DNA fragments (~100 bp in length), enabling amplification from highly degraded DNA recovered from otoliths. SNPs were genotyped using the SNaPshot™ probes designed by Momigliano et al. ( 2018), following manufacturer's instructions.
